title: New to Twitch: OCE Streamer | Come and give us feedback!

embed.description: Too tired for this | OCE | Join The SLaTerSquad

body:
Hey guys,

Come and check the stream out! I would be super happy if you stopped in for a few minutes. 

I want to improve so give me some feedback! Check the twitch page for more info.

Seeya soon! {{summoner:12}}

replies.body:
Stream is up again for today!
Back into my promos to gold :D
Come say hi
$20RP giveaway at 50 followers!!!
Join the SLaTerSquad
